exam.question: He was looking admiringly at the photograph published by Collins in ______ with the Imperial Museum.

answer.explain: 句意： 他十分钦佩地看着柯林斯和皇家博物馆联合出版的照片。collection： 收藏， 搜集品； connection： 连接， 关系； com-bination： 联合， 结合。

sentences.sContent: The company is building the centre in collaboration with the Institute of Offshore Engineering.
sentences.sCn: 该公司正与海洋工程学院合建这座中心。

sentences.sContent: ...The “Love Food, Haste Waste”campaign entered into a collaboration last year with another such network-the Women's Institute...

remMethod.val: col(共同) ＋ labor(工作) ＋ ation(表状态) → 合作

words.tran: [劳经] 合作者；勾结者；通敌者

trans.tranCn: 合作， 协作； 勾结
trans.tranOther: when you work together with another person or group to achieve something, especially in science or art
